reviews.comment: The laundry service was fantastic. My clothes looked and smelled amazing!
My clothes came back with stains and wrinkles. I was really disappointed.
Super quick and efficient service. I got my clothes back the same day!
The laundry service lost one of my shirts and didn't offer any compensation.
I had to wait hours for my laundry to be ready. It was a huge inconvenience.
The staff was friendly and helpful. They even helped me carry my laundry to my car.
Affordable prices and high-quality service. I'll definitely be back!
My clothes came back folded perfectly. I didn't have to lift a finger!
The staff was rude and unhelpful. I won't be using this service again.
The prices were too high for the poor quality of the service. I expected more.
